attributes.action: MAKE THE HOME OFFICE CONTROL ALL POLICE FORCES FOR VICTIMS.
attributes.additional_details:
WE THE UNDERSIGNED WANT TO STOP THE PRACTICE IN THREE FORCES INCLUDING `WEST MERCIA` WHERE IS HAS BEEN HIGHLIGHTED THAT THEY HAVE BEEN OPERATING AS `JUDGE AND JURY`, THIS MAY BE TO ALTER THERE STATS, THE POLICE ARE THERE `ONLY` TO CATCH `CRIMINALS` AND MAKE A CASE TO BE GIVEN TO THE `CPS` TO TAKE TO COURT AND NOT TO DO THE LATTER WITH THE VICTIMS NOT BEING ADDRESSED WHICH MUST BE ALWAYS THE CASE, CAN SEE WHY MOST PEOPLE FAIL TO REPORT THINGS DUE TO LACK OF TRUST AS ABOVE.
VICTIMS FIRST/CRIMINALS SECOND WITH PUNISHMENT TO MEET THERE CRIME.
